fields.name: Acrobatic
fields.description: +2 on tumble and jump checks

fields.name: Agile
fields.description: +2 on Balance and Escape Artist checks

fields.name: Alertness
fields.description: +2 on Listen and Spot checks

fields.name: Animal Affinity
fields.description: +2 on Handle Animal and Ride checks

fields.name: Armor Proficiency (Light)
fields.description: No armor check penalty on attacks

fields.name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
fields.description: No armor check penalties on attacks

fields.name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
fields.description: No armor check penalty on attack rolls

fields.name: Athletic
fields.description: +2 bonus on Climb and Swim checks

fields.name: Augment Summoning
fields.description: Summoned creatures gain +4 Str and Con

fields.name: Blind Fight
fields.description: Reroll miss chance for concealment

fields.name: Combat Casting
fields.description: +4 bonus on concentrate checks for defensive casting

fields.name: Combat Expertise
fields.description: Trade attack bonus for AC (max 5 points)

fields.name: Improved Disarm
fields.description: +4 bonus on disarm attempts; no attacks of opportunity

fields.name: Improved Trip
fields.description: +4 bonus on trip attempts; no attacks of opportunity

fields.name: Improved Feint
fields.description: Feint in combat as move action

fields.name: Combat Reflexes
fields.description: Additional attacks of opportunity

fields.name: Deceitful
fields.description: +2 bonus on Disguise and Forgery checks

fields.name: Deft Hands
fields.description: +2 bonus on Sleight of Hand and Use Rope checks

fields.name: Diligent
fields.description: +2 bonus on Appraise and Decipher Script checks

fields.name: Dodge
fields.description: +1 dodge bonus to AC against selected target

fields.name: Mobility
fields.description: +4 dodge bonus against some AoO

fields.name: Spring Attack
fields.description: Move before and after melee attack

fields.name: Whirlwind Attack
fields.description: One melee attack against each opponent within reach

fields.name: Endurance
fields.description: +4 bonus on checks or saves to resist non-lethal damage

fields.name: Diehard
fields.description: Remain conscious at -1 to -9 hp

fields.name: Eschew Material
fields.description: Cast spells without material components

fields.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
fields.description: no penalty on attacks with specific exotic weapon

fields.name: Extra Turning
fields.description: Can turn or rebuke 4 more times per day

fields.name: Great Fortitude
fields.description: +2 bonus on Fortitude saves

fields.name: Improved Counterspell
fields.description: Counterspell with Spell of same school

fields.name: Improved Critical
fields.description: Double threat range of weapon

fields.name: Improved Initiative
fields.description: +4 bonus on initiative checks
